scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf lib && rm -rf grammar && rm -rf *.tgz
scripts.compile: npm run compile:pregen && npm run genjs && npm run compile:postgen
scripts.genjs: npm run genjs:prepgrammar && npm run genjs:lexer && npm run genjs:parser
scripts.genjs:prepgrammar: rm -rf grammar && mkdir grammar && cp ../antlr4/com/salesforce/soql/*.g4 grammar && cp ../antlr4_imports/javascript/*.g4 grammar
scripts.genjs:lexer: npm run genjs:prepgrammar && antlr4-tool grammar/SoqlLexer.g4 -o lib
scripts.genjs:parser: npm run genjs:prepgrammar && antlr4-tool grammar/SoqlParser.g4 -o lib
